name: Sold!
description:
Description

You just got your dream house! Except... it's a single room, so it's a bit cramped to fit all your furniture!

A game submission for the Indie Tales Jam 2021, under the theme 'one room'.

Controls

  • Mouse left click (Hold) – Select furniture
  • Mouse movement - Drag selected furniture
  • A – Rotate selected furniture left
  • D – Rotate selected furniture right

Credits

  • Game Design & programming: Laurie Trichet & Rafael Gonzalez
  • Visual assets
    • Sprites by Laurie Trichet
    • Font by Kenney
  • Music and sound FX by Laurie Trichet
